TopicTitle: Steam launcher defaults to non-64 bit version (1.2 on windows)

Articles.Content:
Every time I launch KSP prerelease from Steam it pops up a box with two options

  • Play Kerbal Space Program
  • Launch KSP (64-bit)

The first option is the default and it also sounds a lot friendlier - the second option reads as rather technical, like something only technical people would select.

This could result in newer players choosing the non-64 bit option
